treatment-md.title: Tenupedunculus serrulatus Song, Bruce & Min, 2018, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: The first records of Stenobermuda Schultz, 1982 and Tenupedunculus Schultz, 1979 from Australia, with description of two new species from the Great Barrier Reef (Isopoda, Asellota, Stenetriidae)
